org.conqat.lib.commons.concurrent

Class RunnableWithAsyncResultBase<T,X extends java.lang.Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.concurrent.RunnableWithAsyncResultBase<T,X>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type.
    X - the exception type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class RunnableWithAsyncResultBase<T,X extends java.lang.Throwable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A Runnable that provides a result that can be read asynchronously and may also throw an exception.

                         throws X extends java.lang.Throwable

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Returns whether the calculation has been finished.

      • getResult

        public T getResult()
            throws X extends java.lang.Throwable
        Returns the result. If the execution threw an exception, this thrown here. This applies to checked exceptions of type X as well as to runtime exceptions and errors. If the run() method did not terminate yet, an AssertionError is thrown.
        Throws:
        X extends java.lang.Throwable
